meanings.definition: Not able to be reached or achieved.
meanings.sent1: The top shelf was unattainable for the little girl.
meanings.sent2: The treasure hidden in the cave seemed unattainable.
meanings.sent3: The idea of finishing all the homework in one night was unattainable.
meanings.sent4: Her dream of flying without wings felt unattainable.
meanings.sent5: Climbing Mount Everest barefoot would be unattainable.

meanings.sent1: Winning the lottery multiple times is unattainable for most people.
meanings.sent2: Becoming a superhero in real life is an unattainable goal.
meanings.sent3: Trying to eat a whole cake in one bite is unattainable.
meanings.sent4: Reaching the speed of light is an unattainable feat for humans.
meanings.sent5: Growing wings and flying like a bird is completely unattainable.
